short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to share your desktop into meetings with CliteHD Meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to share your desktop into meetings with CliteHD Meetings. When user want to share entire desktop or an opened application or a chrome tab with other participants in the CliteHD Meeting, this extension will allow the user to share the stream. It uses Google Chrome's chooseDesktopMedia API to perform screen/desktop sharing
